clinical_history: Patient with chest pain and shortness of breath.
findings: Enlarged lymph nodes in right lower lobe, suggestive of lymphadenopathy.
Pleural effusion on the right lower lobe side, moderate in size.
Bronchiectatic changes in right lower lobe region.
Patchy ground-glass opacities noted in right lower lobe.
Thoracic aortic aneurysm measuring 15 mm in diameter.
recommendations: Further evaluation with PET-CT recommended if malignancy suspected.
